DISCLOSURE_INFO:
{
  "Allegations" : "WITHOUT DISCLOSING TO LEXINGTON INVESTMENT COMPANY, INC., EX-EMPLOYEE RANKIN AND HIS CUSTOMER EXECUTED TWO PROMISSORY NOTES FROM RANKIN ON 5.26.2010 AND 6.30.10 TOTALING $29,500, EACH WITH A MATURITY OF 1 YEAR.  RANKIN WAS DISMISSED FROM THE FIRM ON 4.30.13 DUE TO POOR PERFORMANCE AND THE FIRM HAD NO KNOWLEDGE OF HIS PRIVATE PERSONAL LOANS FROM THE CLIENT.  ON 12.13.13 A LETTER WAS RECEIVED BY FIRM FROM RANKIN'S EX-CLIENT'S ATTORNEYS THAT HE HAD FAILED ON HIS PROMISSORY NOTES AND THEY RECOGNIZED NO HOPE FOR ANY PAYMENT WOULD COME FROM HIM, THEREFORE THEY ASKED THE FIRM TO PAY THE NOTES.  SUBSEQUENTLY THE FIRM'S ATTORNEY RESPONDED WE HAD NO KNOWLEDGE OF THIS PROHIBITED OUTSIDE ACTIVITY AND REFUSED TO PAY ANY OF RANKIN'S OBLIGATIONS.  THIS CORRESPONDENCE CONCLUDED ON 2.10.14 AND NO FURTHER COMMUNICATIONS HAVE OCCURRED.  THIS WAS NOT A COMPLAINT AT THE TIME OF RANKIN'S DISMISSAL.",
  "Damage Amount Requested" : "$29,500.00",
